```{r fig.width=10}
ggplot(subpage_data, aes_string(fill = as.name(measure))) +
  geom_sf(alpha = 0.8, colour = 'white', size = 0.3) +
  geom_text(data = subpage_data, aes(X, Y, label = asc_name), size = 3) +
  scale_fill_viridis(discrete = FALSE,
                     name = measure,
                     direction = -1,
                     labels = function(x) 
                       format(x, big.mark = ",", scientific = FALSE),
                     guide = guide_colourbar(
                       direction = "horizontal",
                       barheight = unit(2, units = "mm"),
                       barwidth = unit(50, units = "mm"),
                       draw.ulim = F,
                       title.position = 'top',
                       title.hjust = 0.5,
                       label.hjust = 0.5)) +
  labs(x = NULL, y = NULL,
       title = str_c(measure, " by ASC locality")
       #, subtitle = "Source: Local Insight"
       #, caption = "Contains OS data Â© Crown copyright and database right (2021)
       ) +
  theme(line = element_blank(),
        axis.text = element_blank(),
        axis.title = element_blank(),
        panel.background = element_blank(),
        legend.position = c(0.2, 0.09),
        legend.title = element_text(size = 10),
        legend.text = element_text(size = 8))
```

### 
```{r}
subpage_data %>% 
  as_tibble () %>% #drops sf geometry (but not geom column)
  select(-objectid, -X, -Y, -geom) %>% 
  relocate(asc_name, .before = 1) %>% 
  relocate(all_of(measure), .before = 1) %>% 
  rename(ASC = asc_name, "CA number" = ca_number, "CA name" = ca_name) %>%
  datatable(rownames = FALSE, 
            options = list(dom = 't'), 
            class = 'cell-border stripe')
```
